actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to repeal the recently-enacted provisions of law which subject Federal employees to the medicare tax under chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and provide medicare coverage based on Federal employment under titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the Federal hospital insurance tax (Medicare) on Federal employees. Amends titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide Medicare coverage based on Federal employment.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the recently-enacted provisions of law which subject Federal employees to the medicare tax under chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and provide medicare coverage based on Federal employment under titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act.
